short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur any highlighted text or media on a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight text and media and blur them via your browser's right-click menu; control the blur intensity via the extension's popup.

(Limitations) This extension can't blur:

- SVG icons
- Background images
- Text inputs
- Anything that can't be highlighted/selected with your mouse cursor
